name: How did Chewbacca get his WOOKIEE BOWCASTER?
name_original: How did Chewbacca get his WOOKIEE BOWCASTER?
description:
Finally, a text adventure that lets you play as CHEWBACCA as he searches everywhere for his bowcaster. But look out, CHEWBACCA'S brothers want that bowcaster too!

TW: suicidal ideation.
